did.head: Overview of the Collection
did.unittitle: John Westberg Papers Transferred from the Reves Center.
did.abstract: Record storage boxes of files relating settlements of law suits during the Iranian Revolution.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open to all researchers.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Before publishing quotations or excerpts from any materials, permission must be obtained from the Special Collections Research Center, and the holder of the copyright, if not Swem Library.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: John Westberg Papers, Special Collections Research Center, Earl Gregg Swem Library, College of William and Mary.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Information about this individual or organization may be available in the SCRC Wiki: http://scrc.swem.wm.edu/wiki/index.php/Main_Page

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Record storage boxes of files relating settlements of law suits during the Iranian Revolution.
